CustomField.formula: IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")& "/forms/support/?id="&Id& "&ref="&TEXT(On_site_agreement_number__c)& "&cli="&SUBSTITUTE(Customer_first_name__c, " ", "%20")&"%20"&SUBSTITUTE(Customer_last_name__c, " ", "%20")& "&ema="& Customer_email__c & "&add="& Property_address_line_1__c & "&adds="& Property_address_line_2__c & "&addt="& Property_address_towncity__c & "&addc="& Property_address_county__c & "&addp="& Property_address_postcode__c & "&t=1"
CustomField.label: Customer Support Form URL
